lead_paragraph: When Usain Bolt of Jamaica set a world record at 100 meters Saturday night, two questions became urgent: Was the supporting tailwind legal? Was Bolt himself legal?
snippet: When Usain Bolt of Jamaica set a world record at 100 meters Saturday night, two questions became urgent: Was the supporting tailwind legal? Was Bolt himself legal?
